name: Nightingale's Feather
description: Blends perfectly into the gloomy night.

normals.name: Quickdraw
normals.description:
While on the ground, draw the bow repeatedly to attack **5** times.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to **45.5%** of ATK plus **273**.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to **40.7%** of ATK plus **244**.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to **73%** of ATK plus **438**.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to **113%** of ATK plus **678**.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to **104.8%** of ATK plus **629** and knock the target back a short distance.

normals.name: Charged Arrow
normals.description: Tap and hold normal attack to charge an attack. Deal base damage equal to **81.8%** of ATK plus **491**, and **50%** more for each **1** second spent charging, up to **3** seconds. Deal double damage when scoring a headshot or when hitting an enemy's weak point, and knock the target down (headshots are ineffective against Wanderers).

normals.name: Arrow Rain
normals.description: After any normal attack, hold the normal attack button to unleash Arrow Rain, dealing up to **266.7%** of ATK plus **1600** area damage to targets.

normals.name: Air Volley
normals.description:
While airborne, use normal attack to attack **4** times in a row in the air.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to **52.5%** of ATK plus **315**.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to **69%** of ATK plus **414**.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to **105%** of ATK plus **630**.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to **158%** of ATK plus **948**.

dodge.name: Dodge
dodge.description: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, which reduces the speed of enemies within the area. Cooldown: **15** seconds. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for **0.5** seconds.

dodge.name: Loaded Arrow
dodge.description: Tap attack after dodging to trigger Loaded Arrow, knocking the target back by a short distance and dealing damage equal to **115.5%** of ATK plus **693**.

skill.name: Piercing Shot
skill.description: Backflips and fires **1** piercing shot forward, dealing damage equal to **209%** of ATK plus **1254** and knocking the target back. **12**-second cooldown.

discharge.name: Explosive Barrage
discharge.description: When **weapon charge** is full or **Phantasia** is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, **remove all debuffs from the Wanderer** and unleash Explosive Barrage on the target, dealing damage equal to **660%** of ATK plus **3960**.

advancements.description: Restore **1** dodge attempt every fifth normal attack or after using **Piercing Shot**.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by **10%**.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by **20%**.
Dodge skills inflict a grievous effect on targets for **7** seconds.
Increase crit rate to grievous targets by **30%** and crit damage by **50%**.
